job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As the Lead AI/ML Engineer at Caide, you will be at the forefront of our AI activities, driving the development and implementation of AI-driven solutions within our flagship product. This role encompasses a broad range of responsibilities, from chatbot creation to training and hosting large language models. You will ensure our infrastructure is scalable, efficient, and secure, supporting the seamless integration of AI and ML components into our product offerings. Additionally, you will address the complex needs of integrating LLMs, ensuring a seamless and effective deployment. Your work will be pivotal in enhancing the capabilities of our sales automation tool, making it smarter, faster, and more reliable.

   Your role
     * Lead the development and integration of AI and ML technologies within our flagship product, ensuring technical excellence and innovation.
     * Design and implement scalable machine learning models and LLM solutions, focusing on optimising performance and user experience.
     * Oversee the entire AI lifecycle, including data collection, model training, evaluation, and deployment of our LLMs.
     * Ensure the infrastructure supporting AI and ML operations is robust, secure, and capable of scaling with the company's growth.
     * Incorporate REST API capabilities for model exposure, enhancing the accessibility and integration potential of our AI solutions.
     * Stay abreast of the latest AI/ML advancements and incorporate cutting-edge technologies to maintain our competitive edge.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions., * Competitive Salary: We offer a salary that matches your experience and skills, ensuring you are rewarded for your contribution to our success.
     * Remote-First Culture: Enjoy the flexibility of working from anywhere. Our remote-first approach means you can work from the comfort of your home, a co-working space, or wherever you feel most productive.
     * Flexible Hours: Our work structure is built around the concept of flexibility. You can manage your hours to fit your lifestyle, ensuring a healthy work-life balance while meeting project deadlines and participating in essential meetings.
     * Technology Allowance: To support your work from home setup, we provide a technology allowance. This can be used towards purchasing or upgrading your computer, peripherals, or any software that you need to perform at your best.
     * Transportation Allowance: For those rare occasions when you need to travel to the office, we offer a transportation allowance to cover your travel expenses.
     * Agency Over Product: Have a significant impact on our product's direction and features. We value your expertise and insights, giving you the agency to shape the future of our flagship product.
     * Professional Development: We're committed to your growth and encourage continuous learning. We offer opportunities for professional development, including access to courses, conferences, and workshops relevant to your role and career aspirations.

   About Caide

   Caide is a The Hague-based startup that operates in the fast-growing field of B2B AI applications. Our product is a cutting-edge sales automation tool designed to transform B2B outreach by leveraging the latest in artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies. We are on a mission to revolutionise the way businesses connect, and we're looking for a talented & passionate Lead AI/ML Engineer to spearhead our AI initiatives.

   &Work will help you
   Caide has partnered with &Work. &Work understands that it is important to work in a place where you are valued, where you can develop further and where you are given the space to grow. By applying via &Work, you get direct access to their broad network of employers. &Work can help you with the introduction atCaide, provide background information, prepare you for interviews so that you can present yourself convincingly and assist you during the negotiations to help you take a nice step forward in your career.
job_details.full_text:
Lead AI Engineer

As the Lead AI/ML Engineer at Caide, you will be at the forefront of our AI activities, driving the development and implementation of AI-driven solutions within our flagship product. This role encompasses a broad range of responsibilities, from chatbot creation to training and hosting large language models. You will ensure our infrastructure is scalable, efficient, and secure, supporting the seamless integration of AI and ML components into our product offerings. Additionally, you will address the complex needs of integrating LLMs, ensuring a seamless and effective deployment. Your work will be pivotal in enhancing the capabilities of our sales automation tool, making it smarter, faster, and more reliable.

   Your role
     * Lead the development and integration of AI and ML technologies within our flagship product, ensuring technical excellence and innovation.
     * Design and implement scalable machine learning models and LLM solutions, focusing on optimising performance and user experience.
     * Oversee the entire AI lifecycle, including data collection, model training, evaluation, and deployment of our LLMs.
     * Ensure the infrastructure supporting AI and ML operations is robust, secure, and capable of scaling with the company's growth.
     * Incorporate REST API capabilities for model exposure, enhancing the accessibility and integration potential of our AI solutions.
     * Stay abreast of the latest AI/ML advancements and incorporate cutting-edge technologies to maintain our competitive edge.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions., * Competitive Salary: We offer a salary that matches your experience and skills, ensuring you are rewarded for your contribution to our success.
     * Remote-First Culture: Enjoy the flexibility of working from anywhere. Our remote-first approach means you can work from the comfort of your home, a co-working space, or wherever you feel most productive.
     * Flexible Hours: Our work structure is built around the concept of flexibility. You can manage your hours to fit your lifestyle, ensuring a healthy work-life balance while meeting project deadlines and participating in essential meetings.
     * Technology Allowance: To support your work from home setup, we provide a technology allowance. This can be used towards purchasing or upgrading your computer, peripherals, or any software that you need to perform at your best.
     * Transportation Allowance: For those rare occasions when you need to travel to the office, we offer a transportation allowance to cover your travel expenses.
     * Agency Over Product: Have a significant impact on our product's direction and features. We value your expertise and insights, giving you the agency to shape the future of our flagship product.
     * Professional Development: We're committed to your growth and encourage continuous learning. We offer opportunities for professional development, including access to courses, conferences, and workshops relevant to your role and career aspirations.

   About Caide

   Caide is a The Hague-based startup that operates in the fast-growing field of B2B AI applications. Our product is a cutting-edge sales automation tool designed to transform B2B outreach by leveraging the latest in artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies. We are on a mission to revolutionise the way businesses connect, and we're looking for a talented & passionate Lead AI/ML Engineer to spearhead our AI initiatives.

   &Work will help you
   Caide has partnered with &Work. &Work understands that it is important to work in a place where you are valued, where you can develop further and where you are given the space to grow. By applying via &Work, you get direct access to their broad network of employers. &Work can help you with the introduction atCaide, provide background information, prepare you for interviews so that you can present yourself convincingly and assist you during the negotiations to help you take a nice step forward in your career.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, fine-tuning, and deployment of LLMs and AI-driven solutions, including chatbot creation and integrating LLMs into a product. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, focusing on generative models and user-facing applications.

phrases: driving the development and implementation of AI-driven solutions within our flagship product
enhancing the capabilities of our sales automation tool, making it smarter, faster, and more reliable
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions
Agency Over Product: Have a significant impact on our product's direction and features. We value your expertise and insights, giving you the agency to shape the future of our flagship product.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of the business context, the product's goals (sales automation), and the need to translate business requirements into technical AI solutions.

phrases: data collection
job_tasks.justification: While not extensive, 'data collection' is a fundamental aspect of data engineering within the AI lifecycle.

phrases: chatbot creation
training and hosting large language models
Design and implement scalable machine learning models and LLM solutions
model training
evaluation of our LLMs
integrating LLMs
incorporate cutting-edge technologies
job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly mentions developing, training, evaluating, and integrating LLMs and ML models, which are core to the modeling task, especially in the generative AI domain.

phrases: driving the development and implementation of AI-driven solutions within our flagship product
seamless integration of AI and ML components into our product offerings
incorporate cutting-edge technologies to maintain our competitive edge
Incorporating REST API capabilities for model exposure, enhancing the accessibility and integration potential of our AI solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This task is evident in the need to integrate AI/ML into a product, build solutions, and expose models via APIs, indicating software development around AI components.

phrases: hosting large language models
ensure our infrastructure is scalable, efficient, and secure
supporting the seamless integration of AI and ML components
Ensure the infrastructure supporting AI and ML operations is robust, secure, and capable of scaling with the company's growth
deployment of our LLMs
job_tasks.justification: The description highlights the need for scalable, efficient, secure, and robust infrastructure for hosting, deploying, and integrating AI/ML models, which falls under MLOps.

phrases: Lead the development and integration of AI and ML technologies
driving the development and implementation of AI-driven solutions
Agency Over Product: Have a significant impact on our product's direction and features. We value your expertise and insights, giving you the agency to shape the future of our flagship product.
incorporate cutting-edge technologies to maintain our competitive edge
soft_skills.justification: The role is described as 'Lead AI Engineer' with emphasis on driving development, innovation, and having agency over the product's direction, indicating a need for ownership and initiative.

phrases: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions.
soft_skills.justification: Directly states the need to collaborate with cross-functional teams and translate business needs.

phrases: Stay abreast of the latest AI/ML advancements and incorporate cutting-edge technologies to maintain our competitive edge.

Professional Development: We're committed to your growth and encourage continuous learning. We offer opportunities for professional development, including access to courses, conferences, and workshops relevant to your role and career aspirations.
soft_skills.justification: The job requires staying updated with advancements and offers professional development, highlighting the importance of continuous learning.

phrases: driving the development and implementation of AI-driven solutions
ensuring technical excellence and innovation
optimising performance and user experience
address the complex needs of integrating LLMs, ensuring a seamless and effective deployment
making it smarter, faster, and more reliable
soft_skills.justification: The role involves solving complex integration problems, optimizing performance, and ensuring reliability, which requires a pragmatic and problem-solving approach.
